profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.3.2 Annotation dictionaries - Generic flag values
profile.description: If present, the F key's Print flag bit shall be set to 1 and its Hidden, Invisible, ToggleNoView, and NoView flag bits shall be set to 0.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: If present, the F key's Print flag bit shall be set to 1 and its Hidden, Invisible, ToggleNoView, and NoView flag bits shall be set to 0.

error.message: One of the annotation flags Hidden, Invisible, ToggleNoView, or NoView is set to 1, or the Print flag is set to 0
